text:
Marshal will need access to bottled water on-demand.

Marshal needs to take his pills every day. There are packets in the bathroom that are dated and have time stamps. He must take the 8:00AM pack every day. He MUST take these before 2:00PM every day. It is worth waking Marshal up if he has not taken the pills by this time. The 6:00PM pills are optional. Please discard if unused.

Marshal will need his humidifer in this room refilled daily. There is a Brita pitcher in his room that can be filled up to pour into the humidifier. Water must be purified before being put in the humidifier.

Marshal may not have much of an appitite in the first few days. Frosted Mini Wheats are a good snack until he feels like eating whole meals.

He will have limited mobility, so he may need help retrieving things.

Please make sure to keep the sidewalks clear of ice and snow.

Trash goes out Thursday nights.

Allow Marshal to sleep when possible.

As usual, Signal is the best way to reach Marshal.
